__e: Do you mind if we take a look at your daughter's room?
Why don't you come to your daughter's room and we can have a little talk.
Putting aside for a moment whether or not you were asleep, can you explain what you were doing in your daughter's room with a loaded gun?
It means that the man who's responsible for your daughter's death is going to prison.
My faith got me through the death of my daughter. Hmm.
You keep my own daughter's death a secret because you think I'm too weak for the truth'?
I don't remember inviting you to my daughter's wedding. Well, Lord, I assumed you'd just forgotten.
The point is, I did not know that it was your car... and I certainly did not know about your daughter's wedding.
If there's nothing else, I'd like to go to my daughter's wedding.
Just give me your daughter's hand, and I'll set you free.
Well, to come straight to the point of the matter, sir, I... - I want to ask for your daughter's hand.
To hold your daughter's hand, trying to memorize what it feels like so you won't forget.
- Trying to save your daughter's life, sir.
That's how little you know what's going on in your own daughter's life you don't even know the name of--
What would you be willing to do to save the life of your child?
